=======
Changes
=======

2.0.1 (*2025-10-21*)
====================

- Sphinx 8 support

2.0.0 (*2023-08-17*)
====================

- Sphinx 7 support
- Python 3.11 support

1.1.2 (*2021-06-02*)
====================

- Fix error when text is None

1.1.1 (*2021-02-03*)
====================

- Fix dead link in post list

1.1.0 (*2021-02-02*)
====================

- Add ABlog support
- Fix table generation with literal blocks
- Fix image copy when using glob

1.0.0 (*2021-02-01*)
====================

- Support tables (not nested)
- Copy images and download files

0.0.1 (*2021-01-11*)
====================

- Initial project
